channel.title: Running an old source
channel.description:
So I downloaded an old source (Devolution 2007 to be exact) and I'm trying to use an older client to connect but upon login I am disconnected with some errors posting in the client's CMD. I thought I knew how to fix this problem but the things I changed didn't do anything to help with the problem.
Error: Error: T2 - 126,134,126 - 4,0,0 - 49,10,47,6,
Things done: Switched NPC bits to 12. Commented out headIcon in player.java Commented out anything in the initialize void in client.java that involved sendFrame126 or any other sendFrame.
Help? :P

item.title: Running an old source
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

So I downloaded an old source (Devolution 2007 to be exact) and I’m trying to use an older client to connect but upon login I am disconnected with some errors posting in the client’s CMD. I thought I knew how to fix this problem but the things I changed didn’t do anything to help with the problem.

Error:
Error: T2 - 126,134,126 - 4,0,0 - 49,10,47,6,

Things done:
Switched NPC bits to 12.
Commented out headIcon in player.java
Commented out anything in the initialize void in client.java that involved sendFrame126 or any other sendFrame.

Help?

Read full topic
